div.bibl: Dziennik Chicagoski, Jan. 14, 1922. FOR THE ST. JOSEPH OLD PEOPLE'S HOME

body.p: The following persons have made Christmas contributions to the St. Joseph Old People's Home:
Ten dollars each: Messrs. J. Korzeniewski, J. A. Lasecki, and L. N. Piotrowski.
Five dollars each: Messrs. H. Radajewski, W. Bardonski, J. Smietanka, J. Wronski, A. F. Laskowski, and A. Kucharski.
Two dollars: Messrs. K. Wronski, J. Nering, and M. Sobczak and Dr. H. Gorecki.
To all donors the Franciscan Sisters say, "God bless you!"
